英文法規名稱: Regulations on Duration of Programs and Distribution and Amount of Advertisements of Satellite Broadcasting Businesses
中文法規名稱: 衛星廣播電視節目起迄時間認定與廣告播送方式及數量分配辦法
沿革內容: 1.4 Articles promulgated in full by National Communications Commission on November 3, 2016. Ref：Tong-Chuan-Nei-Rong No.10548031480

法規內容.條文內容: These regulations are enacted in accordance with the provisions of Paragraph 4, Article 36 of the Satellite Broadcasting Act.

The term“Duration of Programs”in the provisions of Paragraph 4, Article 36 of the Satellite Broadcasting Act refers to a period from the onset of broadcasting program title, graphic, audio or text recognized as the start of the program to the moment before the broadcasting of next program title, graphic, audio or text recognized as the start of the following program.

Advertisements may be inserted twice in programs that last up to 30 minutes, three times in programs that last up to 45 minutes, and four times in programs that last up to 60 minutes. For broadcasting of live events, advertisements may be inserted at suitable times.
These regulations shall come into force as of the date of promulgation.
